backend/main.mo: Main actor defines siteDomain, user profile and contact management with access control and admin-only retrieval functions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module adds the new siteDomain field while preserving existing state during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the custom site slug change to AryaTatainsurance and related frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend components, styles, and utilities in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining color tokens, dark mode values, and shared global styles.
frontend/index.html: Entry HTML file setting the site slug meta tag to AryaTatainsurance and loading the app bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App component that enables hash-based auto-scroll to the Advisor section and renders the landing page.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Validated contact form component handling field input, error messages, and backend submission with success state.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: About section presenting service description and four feature cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/Advisor: Advisor section with anchor id, portrait, and advisor details for scroll targeting.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders a contact section with phone, WhatsApp, location info, and an embedded ContactForm.
frontend/src/components/sections/Coverag: Displays a grid of health insurance coverage items with icons.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqSect: Shows an accordion-style FAQ list with questions and expandable answers.
frontend/src/components/sections/FooterS: Provides site footer with branding, contact details, copyright, and a caffeine.ai credit link.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeaderT: Renders a sticky top bar with logo, advisor info, and a click-to-call button.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays the hero banner with headline, call-to-action buttons, and hero illustration.
frontend/src/components/sections/PlanOpt: Shows available insurance plan types in a grid of icon cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/TataAig: Presents TATA AIG insurance benefits in a styled card layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Lists key reasons to choose the service using icon-feature cards.
frontend/src/components/SecureHealthKera: Composes all landing page sections including Advisor, FAQ, and Contact in order.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a React Query mutation hook that submits a contact via an actor and invalidates the contacts query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom color variables, dark mode settings, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/siteSlug.ts: Offers utilities to validate and retrieve a predefined site slug with fallback handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters, including session storage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radius, animations, plugins, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, features, and branding notes for the Secure Health Kerala website.
